title: 820-3115 Quarter Fan
message: Got this board here completely dead with a little corrosion around C5010, which mad the trace between it and the pad passing through SMC to evaporate. I ran a wire to rebuild the trace and now the board has green light but only quarter fan and dies, no loop, just a single spin and dies until I remove power and reconnect and it does the same. Already verified classic sensors such as battery sensing circuit, ISL6259(even replaced it because diode mode on some pins were a bit strange and normalized after replacing) and verified PBUS sensors which are classic on this board to die too. Still no luck. Any ideas?

title: 820-3115 Quarter Fan
message: C5626 was a little corroded and that's why it was having quarter fan. Solved
